import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' class ShopBanner extends React.Component { render() { let shop = this.props.shop; let star = let style = { fontSize: '14px', color: '#767676', lineHeight:'20px', overflow: 'hidden', display: '-webkit-box', textOverflow: 'ellipsis', WebkitLineClamp:'1', WebkitBoxOrient: 'vertical', margin: '0' } return (

  • {shop.name}

    {shop.addr}

    {star}{star}{star}{star}{star}
    {shop.distance}km
    • ) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ shop: state.data[state.data_now.index_shop] }) export default connect( mapStateToProps, null )(ShopBanner)
